name: Caprese Tomato Soup
description: Served caprese-style with burrata, balsamic reduction, and fresh basil leaves!
recipeIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper (to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. Add olive oil and onion to the bottom of an 8×8 baking dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. Add olive oil and onion to the bottom of an 8×8 baking dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Add tomatoes, cut side up, in an even layer over the onion; season with salt and pepper, to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Add tomatoes, cut side up, in an even layer over the onion; season with salt and pepper, to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Place into oven and roast until slightly tender, about 20 minutes. Add garlic in an even layer over the tomatoes. Place into oven and roast until the tomatoes are soft, an additional 10 minutes; let cool 10-15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Place into oven and roast until slightly tender, about 20 minutes. Add garlic in an even layer over the tomatoes. Place into oven and roast until the tomatoes are soft, an additional 10 minutes; let cool 10-15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tomatoes, bread, Parmesan and broth in blender or food processor until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine tomatoes, bread, Parmesan and broth in blender or food processor until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately, garnished with burrata, balsamic reduction and basil leaves.
